sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-order-details', templateUrl: './order-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order-details.component.css'] }) export class OrderDetailsComponent { }
Order Details : {{orderId}}
  • Date : {{orderDetails.date | date : 'dd/MM/yyyy'}}
  • State : {{orderDetails.state}}
ID Product Name Price Quantity Amount
{{pi.id}} {{pi.product.name}} {{pi.price | number :'0.2-2'}} {{pi.quantity}} {{pi.quantity * pi.price | number :'0.2-2'}}
Total {{getTotal(orderDetails)| number :'0.2-2'}}
